meanings.definition: Moving or operating in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: The unidirectional road only allows cars to travel in one direction.
meanings.sent2: The river flows in a unidirectional manner from the mountains to the sea.
meanings.sent3: The unidirectional escalator only goes up, making it a fun challenge to go down.
meanings.sent4: Her unidirectional focus on her goals propelled her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The unidirectional arrow on the sign pointed the way to the exit clearly.

meanings.definition: Transmitting or receiving signals in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: The unidirectional microphone only picks up sound from one direction.
meanings.sent2: The satellite dish is designed to receive unidirectional signals from space.
meanings.sent3: The unidirectional radio antenna made sure the aliens could only hear us, not the other way around.
meanings.sent4: His unidirectional focus on the conversation made him miss important cues from the other person.
meanings.sent5: The unidirectional transmission of data ensured secure communication between the two computers.
